title: Sleeping with My Murderer
overview: Sleeping with My Murderer is an original British true crime documentary series offering unrivalled access to ten tragically, ill fated love storiesIntimate interviews offer unrivalled access to the inner workings of relationships as we hear tales of the deadly consequences of bad romance.In each of these gripping episodes, family and friends speak of the horror and heartbreak they have endured, sharing their stories of love turning sour and lovers turning killer. With contributions from law enforcement and legal professionals, each aspect of the case is forensically uncovered.Choosing a partner is one of the most important decisions we make…learning to recognise the red flags could save a life. Sleeping with my Murderer highlights the warning signs that are always there…if you know where to look.
